scripts.typeorm:generate-migration: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm -- migration:generate -d ./src/config/data-source.ts ./src/db/migrations/$npm_config_name
scripts.typeorm:run-migrations:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm -- migration:run -d ./src/config/data-source.ts
scripts.typeorm:revert-migrations:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm -- migration:revert -d ./src/config/data-source.ts
scripts.typeorm:drop:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm -- schema:drop -d ./src/config/data-source.ts
scripts.typeorm:revert-migrations:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run typeorm -- migration:revert -d ./src/config/data-source.ts
